European airports prevent at least 200 pro - Palestinian activists from flying to Israel.
In Pakistan, more troops deploy in Karachi...
...with instructions to shoot on sight any armed men involved in attacks.
In Egypt, demonstrators in Tahrir Square protest the military government's slow pace of reforms.
In Yemen, President Saleh appears on television for the first time...
...since his medical treatment in Saudi Arabia.
Protests continue in Hama, Syria against the government of President Assad.
In Peru, a light and music show celebrates the 100th anniversary...
...of US explorer Hiram Bingham's discovery of Machu Picchu.
